DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I'm a fellow Vault dweller.
RESPONSE TEXT: I don't care where you're from. It's not here.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude. / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Yeah? That attitude's exactly why you don't belong here.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Well, aren't you a ray of sunshine?
RESPONSE TEXT: You think you're funny? That's exactly why outsiders don't belong here.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude. / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: What do you have against outsiders?
RESPONSE TEXT: All outsiders do is take advantage of you. You're nothing but selfish animals.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm a fellow Vault dweller.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: What do you have against outsiders?
RESPONSE TEXT: Yeah, you could say that. I met a girl, from the outside. Said she was going to take me away from all this.
SCRIPT NOTES: Angrily recounting her love story of betrayal. First of a series of 4 lines. / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: I gave her all my money so she could find us a place to live out there.
SCRIPT NOTES: Angrily recounting her love story of betrayal. 2nd of a series of 4 lines. Previous line: Said she was going to take me away from all this. / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: I don't hear from her in months, till a passing trader mentions she saw her with some man in Diamond City.
SCRIPT NOTES: Angrily recounting her love story of betrayal. 3rd of a series of 4. Previous: I gave her all my money so she could find us a place to live out there / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: You outsiders are nothing but liars, only looking out for yourselves.
SCRIPT NOTES: Calm anger. Last of a series of 4 lines. Previous line: ...till a passing trader mentions she saw her with some man in Diamond City. / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: What do you have against outsiders?
RESPONSE TEXT: Let's just say I learned my lesson the hard way.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Just taking a look around.
RESPONSE TEXT: Heh, is the Overseer just letting anyone in these days?
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm a fellow Vault dweller.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude, condescending toward the player / Friendly

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: None of your concern.
RESPONSE TEXT: Hey, I live here. Of course it's my concern. And you're a prime example of why outsiders should be kept outside.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm a fellow Vault dweller.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude. Emphasis on "my concern" and "OUTside". Doesn't like the player. / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Here to do a little trading.
RESPONSE TEXT: Well, make it quick. We don't need your kind lingering around here.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm a fellow Vault dweller.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude. Dislikes outsiders (the player). / Irritated

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: What's with the attitude?
RESPONSE TEXT: I don't trust outsiders. We didn't need your help before, we don't need it now.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude. First of a series of 2 lines.  / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: The Overseer never should have opened up the Vault to your kind.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm a fellow Vault dweller.
SCRIPT NOTES: Rude. "Overseer" with sneering disrespect. Doesn't approve of Overseer or player. Last of a series of 2 lines. "We don't need your help." / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Another outsider? What'd they let you in for?
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Just taking a look around.
SCRIPT NOTES: Suspicious, with attitude. Doesn't like outsiders. Emphasis on "you" / Suspicious

RESPONSE TEXT: Leave me alone. I've got work to do.
SCRIPT NOTES: A bit rude. Doesn't like outsiders (the player). / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: I got nothing to say to you.
SCRIPT NOTES: A bit rude. Doesn't like outsiders (the player). / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: If you're looking for friendly conversation, you won't find it here.
SCRIPT NOTES: A bit rude. Doesn't like outsiders (the player). / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Don't you have someone else you can bother?
SCRIPT NOTES: A bit rude. Doesn't like outsiders (the player). / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Seriously? I don't want to talk.
SCRIPT NOTES: A bit rude. Doesn't like outsiders (the player). / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Typical outsider. Letting a child die like that. I can't believe you can even show your face here.
SCRIPT NOTES: Very rude. Hates the player even more now for letting a child die. / Disgust

RESPONSE TEXT: I heard about what you did for Austin. And... yeah... thanks.
SCRIPT NOTES: Apologetic and grateful. Was mean to the player before. / Grateful

RESPONSE TEXT: Look, I'm sorry for being so harsh before. I'm not beyond admitting when I'm wrong.
SCRIPT NOTES: Apologetic and grateful. Was mean to the player before. / Apologetic

RESPONSE TEXT: It's good to see that kid back on his feet.
SCRIPT NOTES: Relieved. / Neutral

RESPONSE TEXT: Things sure are going to change around here.
SCRIPT NOTES: Reflective. More to herself than the player. Unsure if things will change for the better or worse. / Neutral

RESPONSE TEXT: Finding a whole new section to the Vault? It's so... disturbing.
SCRIPT NOTES: Reflective and distrubed. / Neutral

RESPONSE TEXT: Nothing to say for yourself?
SCRIPT NOTES: Player isn't responding / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Sure, just pretend I'm not here.
SCRIPT NOTES: Player isn't responding / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Something wrong with you?
SCRIPT NOTES: Player isn't responding / Irritated

RESPONSE TEXT: Nice to know it wasn't another migraine kicking in.
